newsitem.title: UK: RUGBY UNION-HOWLEY DOUBTFUL FOR IRISH TEST.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY UNION-HOWLEY DOUBTFUL FOR IRISH TEST.

text.p: Welsh scrum-half Robert Howley is doubtful for the Five Nations encounter against Ireland in Cardiff on Saturday.
Howley suffered a strained ligament in his shoulder in training last week and rates his chances of being fit as only 50-50.
"Last Wednesday I was quite confident of being fit, but now I am not so sure," said Howley. "It hasn't come on as I hoped it would have done...it is quite painful when I move my arm across my chest."
